      • plaintextToCiphertext

        public TlsCiphertext plaintextToCiphertext(TlsPlaintext plaintext,
                                           TlsEncryptionParameters parameters)
        Description copied from interface: TlsCipherSuite
        Transforms a TLSPlaintext to a TLSCiphertext. The Message will be MACed and encrypted according to the used ciphersuite.
        Specified by:
        plaintextToCiphertext in interface TlsCipherSuite
        Parameters:
        plaintext - the TLSPlaintext
        parameters - the encryption parameters used to encrypt
        Returns:
        the TLSCiphertext

      • ciphertextToPlaintext

        public TlsPlaintext ciphertextToPlaintext(byte[] ciphertextBytes,
                                          TlsEncryptionParameters parameters,
                                          TlsCipherSuiteRegistry registry,
                                          TlsKeyExchangeAlgorithm algorithm)
                                   throws TlsBadRecordMacException,
                                          TlsDecodeErrorException
        Description copied from interface: TlsCipherSuite
        Transforms a TLSCiphertext to a TLSPlaintext. The Message will be decrypted and the MAC will be checked according to the used ciphersuite.
        Specified by:
        ciphertextToPlaintext in interface TlsCipherSuite
        Parameters:
        ciphertextBytes - the TLSCiphertext bytes
        parameters - the encryption parameters used to decrypt
        registry - the cipher suite registry
        algorithm - the used key exchange algorithm
        Returns:
        the TlsPlaintext
        Throws:
        TlsBadRecordMacException - if the message has an invalid MAC
        TlsDecodeErrorException - if the message itself can not be decoded properly

      • encrypt

        public abstract byte[] encrypt(byte[] key,
                               byte[] nonce,
                               byte[] additionalData,
                               byte[] plaintext)
        The encrypt operation must be implemented by concrete cipher suites. It encrypts plaintext bytes and authenticates them and additional data bytes using a key and a nonce.
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        nonce - the nonce
        additionalData - the additional data
        plaintext - the plaintext
        Returns:
        the encrypted bytes

      • decrypt

        public abstract byte[] decrypt(byte[] key,
                               byte[] nonce,
                               byte[] additionalData,
                               byte[] ciphertext)
                        throws TlsBadRecordMacException
        the decrypt operation must be implemented by concrete cipher suites. It authenticates the ciphertext and additional data and decrypts the encrypted bytes using a key and a nonce.
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        nonce - the nonce
        additionalData - the additional data
        ciphertext - the ciphertext
        Returns:
        the decrypted bytes
        Throws:
        TlsBadRecordMacException - if the ciphertext could not be authenticated. Reasons may be an invalid key, an invalid nonce, invalid additional data or an altered ciphertext.

      • getAuthenticationTagLength

        public abstract int getAuthenticationTagLength()
        Returns the length of the cipher suite dependent authentication tag.
        Returns:
        the authentication tag

        public byte getMacLength()
        Description copied from interface: TlsCipherSuite
        The MAC length of the cipher suite.
        Specified by:

      • getRecordIvLength

        public byte getRecordIvLength()
        Description copied from interface: TlsCipherSuite
        The record initialization vector length used by block ciphers.
        Specified by:
        getRecordIvLength in interface TlsCipherSuite
        Returns:
        the length in bytes for block ciphers or 0 for stream and AEAD cipher suites
